scripts.build:components-core: cd libs/@livekit/components-core && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:components-react: cd libs/@livekit/components-react && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:mutex: cd libs/@livekit/mutex && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:protocol: cd libs/@livekit/protocol && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:livekit-client: cd libs/livekit-client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:libs: npm run build:protocol && npm run build:mutex && npm run build:livekit-client && npm run build:components-core && npm run build:components-react
scripts.watch:libs: npm run watch:components-core & npm run watch:components-react & npm run watch:livekit-client
